headline: Solar Foods Factory Producing Solein Air-Based Protein Opens
summary: Solar Foods begins production at its first commercial facility, producing Solein protein from air and electricity.

headline: BioMason Announces Collaboration to Develop Bio-Based Cement Alternative
summary: BioMason collaborates to develop a sustainable alternative to traditional cement using biological processes and reducing CO2 emissions.

headline: Modern Synthesis Raises $4.1M to Scale Microbial Textile Platform
summary: Modern Synthesis gets investment to expand its platform for creating textiles from microbes, replacing traditional fabrics.

headline: Bolt Threads Partners with Adidas for Mushroom Leather Apparel Line
summary: Bolt Threads collaborates with Adidas to create apparel using Mylo, a mushroom-based leather alternative.

headline: Genecis Bioplastics Raises Series A for PHA Production from Food Waste
summary: Genecis secures Series A funding to scale production of PHA bioplastics derived from food waste, replacing petroleum plastics.

headline: Change Foods Secures Funding to Scale Precision Fermentation Cheese
summary: Change Foods receives investment to expand production of animal-free cheese using precision fermentation technology.

headline: Algiknit Secures Seed Funding for Seaweed-Based Yarn Alternative
summary: Algiknit obtains seed funding to further develop its sustainable yarn made from seaweed, replacing synthetic materials.

headline: The EVERY Co. Launches New Animal-Free Egg Product for Food Manufacturers
summary: The EVERY Co. releases a new egg alternative produced via precision fermentation, aimed at food manufacturers.
